entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Snow ending overnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Periods of light snow beginning near noon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 9. Wind chill near minus 18. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Thursday 20 April 2023
